Description_lang: Holy Shock has a $h% chance to increase the critical healing of your Flash of Light, Holy Light, and Light of Dawn by ${$254332m1/2}% for $254332d.

name_blz.es_ES: Item - Paladin T21 Holy 4P Bonus - Holy Shock Buffs Crit Healing

description_blz.en_US: Holy Shock has a 30% chance to increase the critical healing of your Flash of Light, Holy Light, and Light of Dawn by 100% for 10 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Choque sagrado tiene un 30% de probabilidad de aumentar un 100% la sanación crítica de tu Destello de luz, Luz sagrada y Luz del alba durante 10 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Choque Sagrado tem 30% de chance de aumentar em 100% a cura crítica dos seus feitiços Clarão de Luz, Luz Sagrada e Luz da Aurora por 10 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Beim Einsatz von 'Heiliger Schock' besteht eine Chance von 30%, die kritische Heilung Eurer Zauber 'Lichtblitz', 'Heiliges Licht' und 'Licht der Morgendämmerung' für 10 Sek. um 100% zu erhöhen.
description_blz.en_GB: Holy Shock has a 30% chance to increase the critical healing of your Flash of Light, Holy Light, and Light of Dawn by 100% for 10 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Choque Sagrado tiene un 30% de probabilidad de aumentar la sanación crítica de tu Destello de Luz, Luz Sagrada y Luz del alba un 100% durante 10 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Horion sacré a 30% de chances d’augmenter de 100% les soins critiques d’Éclair lumineux, Lumière sacrée et Lumière de l’aube pendant 10 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Folgore Sacra ha una probabilità del 30% di aumentare le cure critiche fornite da Lampo di Luce, Luce Sacra e Luce dell'Alba del 100% per 10 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: При применении "Шока небес" с вероятностью 30% критический эффект лечения от ваших "Вспышки Света", "Света небес" и "Света зари" усилится на 100% на 10 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 신성 충격이 30%의 확률로 10초 동안 다음 빛의 섬광, 성스러운 빛, 여명의 빛의 주문 극대화 치유량을 100%만큼 증가시킵니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 神聖震擊有30%的機率使聖光閃現、聖光術和黎明曙光造成的極效治療效果提高100%，持續10秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 神圣震击有30%的几率使你的圣光闪现，圣光术和黎明之光的爆击治疗效果提高100%，持续10秒。
